Lawn Mowing Simulator is a singleplayer third-person simulation game.

General information

Steam Community Discussions

Availability[edit]

Source DRM Notes Keys OS
Epic Games Store
GamersGate
Green Man Gaming
Humble Store
Microsoft Store
Xbox Play Anywhere.
Steam
Landmark Edition also available.

Monetization[edit]

Type Notes
DLC The Ancient Britain and Dino Safari DLC each add four new locations to the game.
One-time game purchase The game requires an upfront purchase to access.

System requirements[edit]

Windows
MinimumRecommended
Operating system (OS) 10
Processor (CPU) Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8 GHz
AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz		Intel Core i7-6950X 3.0 GHz
AMD Ryzen 7 1700X 3.4 GHz
System memory (RAM) 8 GB
Storage drive (HDD/SSD) 20 GB
Video card (GPU) Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
AMD Radeon R9 390X
4 GB (Nvidia), 8 GB (AMD) of VRAM
DirectX 11 compatible		Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 Super
AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
6 GB (Nvidia), 8 GB (AMD) of VRAM
DirectX 12 compatible


Notes

  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 Notes regarding Steam Play (Linux) data:
    • File/folder structure within this directory reflects the path(s) listed for Windows and/or Steam game data.
    • Games with Steam Cloud support may also store data in ~/.steam/steam/userdata/<user-id>/1480560/.
    • Use Wine's registry editor to access any Windows registry paths.
    • The app ID (1480560) may differ in some cases.
    • Treat backslashes as forward slashes.
    • See the glossary page for details on Windows data paths.

References

  1. ↑ Steam - Lawn Mowing Simulator - last accessed on 2022-07-25
    "Toro, SCAG and STIGA front line Lawn Mowing Simulator with their real-world machines painstakingly re-created visually and physically."
